content: Execute REQUIREMENTS GATE validation - Verify enhancement plan meets formatting.md, organization.md, and communication.md standards while preserving metadata-free operation
Execute PROCESS GATE validation - Confirm navigation integration follows established workflow patterns and systematic implementation approach
Execute OUTPUT GATE validation - Assess deliverable quality against engineering standards and simplicity principles
Execute SYSTEM GATE validation - Validate enhancement maintains CLAUDE.md ultimate authority status and framework integrity
Generate comprehensive validation checklist and success criteria for enhancement implementation
